definition: remote/hidden away/secluded/serene/peaceful/to imprison/in superstition indicates the underworld/ancient district spanning Liaonang and Hebei provinces

gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)

pinyin: you1 men2 luo2 xuan2 gan3 jun1

sentences.english: The use of gastric emptying rate of phenol red measured response in each group pyloric sphincter pressure in rats.
sentences.chinese: 利用酚红测胃排空率反应各组大鼠胃幽门括约肌压力。

sentences.english: The method of reverse phase hemagglutination test for serum Helicobacter pylori antigen(HP-RPHA)was founded.
sentences.chinese: 建立反相间接血凝法检测幽门螺杆菌抗原的方法。

sentences.english: Objective To search the surgical methods of esophageal carcinoma complicated with cicatricial pyloric obstruction .
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨食管癌合并瘢痕性幽门梗阻的手术方法。

sentences.english: We are still learning a lot about the connection between H. pylori infection and gastric cancer.
sentences.chinese: 我们还在继续研究幽门螺杆菌感染与胃癌之间的关系。

sentences.english: Does Helicobacter pylori eradication therapy for peptic ulcer prevent gastric cancer?
sentences.chinese: 幽门螺杆菌根除治疗消化性溃疡是否能预防胃癌？

sentences.english: Stomach is composed of two parts, the cardiac and pyloric region, at the first stage of mysis.
sentences.chinese: 在糠虾幼虫第一期，胃分为贲门胃和幽门胃两部分。

sentences.english: The pylorus may be palpated as a thick ring of muscle .
sentences.chinese: 可触诊出幽门是增厚的肌肉环。

sentences.english: Furazolidone and carbenoxolone showed synergistic effects on the pyloric ligation model.
sentences.chinese: 呋喃唑酮和生胃酮对幽门结扎模型的保护有协同作用。

sentences.english: Evidence suggests it harbors bactericidal efficacy against H. pylori.
sentences.chinese: 有证据提示它对幽门螺杆菌有杀菌作用。

sentences.english: Objective To study the relationship between helicobacter pylori and portal hypertensive gastropathy .
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨幽门螺杆菌与门脉高压性胃病的相关性。

sentences.english: Infection with Helicobacter pylori will also increase the risk of developing stomach cancer.
sentences.chinese: 而受幽门螺旋杆菌感染亦会增加患上胃癌的风险。

sentences.english: Gastric intestinal metaplasia is a common finding in countries with a high prevalence of Helicobacter pylori infection.
sentences.chinese: 胃的肠化生在幽门螺杆菌高感染率的国家普遍存在。

sentences.english: H. pylori infection is often longstanding.
sentences.chinese: 幽门螺杆菌的感染通常是长期存在的。

sentences.english: The pylorus may be palpated as a thick ring of muscle.
sentences.chinese: 可扪诊幽门如增厚的肌肉环。

sentences.english: Uses the pylorus myo- incision technique is the best method of treatment.
sentences.chinese: 采用幽门肌切开术是最好的治疗方法。

sentences.english: MARTIN J. BLASER is one of the world's foremost experts on Helicobacter pylori.
sentences.chinese: 布雷塞是研究幽门螺旋菌的世界权威之一。

definition: jejunum (empty gut, middle segment of small intestine between duodenum 十二指腸|十二指肠[shi2 er4 zhi3 chang2] and ileum 回腸|回肠[hui2 chang2])
esophagus/the proper way to eat/food transportation route
transverse colon (anatomy)/second section of large intestine
sigmoid colon (anatomy)/bent colon, linking the descending colon to the rectum
